description:
Sneak into the top-secret government facility to unveil the truths hidden from the public eye. Take your camera with you and capture photos of everything that looks suspicious.


CONSPIRACY THEORIES
Is the government watching us with robotic birds, or maybe the Earth is flat, and the aliens are already present in our lives? This place is full of conspiracy theories waiting to be revealed to society.


STRATEGIC GAMEPLAY
As you navigate through the labs, you will encounter guards, but they will move only when you do. Are they even humans? Donâ€™t let those reptilians see you and use every available cover to hide from their sight.


KEY FEATURES:
- 6 floors full of mysteries
- Multiple ways to outsmart securities
- Intriguing soundtrack
name: They Know
